text.div:
NHSNContraindicationType

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/terminology/codesystem/cdcnhsn.html
    Code Display
    6131-7 Patient is less than 2 months of age - chlorhexidine gluconate is to be used with caution in patients less than 2 months of age
    6132-5 Patient has a documented/known allergy/reaction to chlorhexidine gluconate-based products that would preclude its use
    6133-3 Facility restrictions or safety concerns for chlorhexidine gluconate use in premature infants precludes its use
